import React from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function CurrentWeather({ resultData }) { const day = new Date(); const dayOfWeek = weekDay[day.getDay()]; const weekDay = [ "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", ]; return (
{Math.round(resultData.main.temp)} Â°C

{resultData.weather[0].description}

Humidity: {resultData.main.humidity}% Wind: {Math.round(resultData.wind.speed)} m/s

{resultData.name} - {resultData.sys.country}{" "}

{dayOfWeek}
); } export default CurrentWeather;
